title: How to Make an Antibacterial Spray

steps.headline: Pour the water into a clean spray bottle.
Mix the essential oils together.
steps.description: Use a ceramic bowl or a glass jar to do this.

steps.headline: With an eye dropper, add 8 drops of the essential oil mix to the water.
Shake before use.
steps.description: Spray onto any surface you want to clean. It does not need to be rinsed off.

steps.headline: Label the stored spray bottle clearly.

text: Pour the water into a clean spray bottle.  Mix the essential oils together. Use a ceramic bowl or a glass jar to do this. With an eye dropper, add 8 drops of the essential oil mix to the water. Shake together. Shake before use. Spray onto any surface you want to clean. It does not need to be rinsed off. Label the stored spray bottle clearly.
